A C G L M N P R S X 

X

XComponent - Annotation Type in com.xiaosfx.annotation
All the GUI components that are going to be added to XLayout should have this annotation.
Note: Containers are also considered as Components

Visit: http://www.xiaosfx.com for more informations.
XContainer - Annotation Type in com.xiaosfx.annotation
All the classes that are going to use XLayout and all the containers inside of it
should have this annotation.

When using on a container, you need to set it's layout to null, and also remember
to set it's name, because by default it's value = "",
this should be done to avoid "conflict" between the class container and this container,
unless you've changed the class container's name.

Note: The names are Case-Sensitive.

Visit: http://www.xiaosfx.com for more informations.
XLayout - Class in com.xiaosfx
The XLayout lays out a custom container class by arranging and resizing its components, which are identified by the @XComponent Annotation, based on the components annotation values (left, right, top, bottom, horizontalCenter and VerticalCenter constraints, or width and height values).
XLayout() - Constructor for class com.xiaosfx.XLayout
 
XLayout(boolean) - Constructor for class com.xiaosfx.XLayout
Setting the keepMinimumSize to True will prevent the components being resized under it's minimumSize.

Note: This means, that you won't be able to set a custom size that goes under it's minimumSize.
XUtilities - Class in com.xiaosfx
Provides specific sorting methods for the XLayout class.
Do not use it, if you're only building a GUI

Visit: http://www.xiaosfx.com for more informations.
XUtilities() - Constructor for class com.xiaosfx.XUtilities
